GPUCompilationMessageOffset.summary:
The offset read-only property of the
interface is a number representing the offset from the start of the shader code to the exact point, or the start of the relevant substring, that the message corresponds to.
GPUCompilationMessageOffset.value: A number.To be precise, offset is the number of UTF-16 code units from the beginning of the shader code to the exact point or start of the relevant substring that the message corresponds to.If the message does not correspond to a specific code position (perhaps it refers to the whole of the shader code), offset will be 0.
